title: srI raama jayaraama shruthajana
sahitya:
shrI rAma jayarAma shrtajana ripu bhIma shrngAra guNadhAma O rAma

caraNam 1

 cUcinavAriki culakanAga dOca nannEcuTa kika nyAyamA O rAma
   
caraNam 2

 durjana bhUyisthamuna dagilina nE sajjanu DETlauDunO O rAma
   
caraNam 3

 EdAri bOyina nAdAri kaDDamu vAdADEdaru gAni O rAma
   
caraNam 4

 kalimAnavulu verri calamuna tatvamu teliyalEru summi O rAma
   
caraNam 5

 tAmarAku nIru vidhamu prapancamu tatvamu gAdu sumi O rAma
   
caraNam 6

 nE nokaTincina nI manasu veraguTakE nEramO teliya O rAma
   
caraNam 7

 gajja muNDla mIda dagulukonna madi vaccunA nI vadduku O rAma
   
caraNam 8

 accuga bhavamuna tagulukonna madi vaccunA nI vadduku O rAma
   
caraNam 9

 ahirAja shayana nIkanucu jEsina panula hitamuga dOcenA O rAma
 
caraNam 10

 mahijarIti nannu mannincuna nIdu mahima kEmi takkuva O rAma
 
caraNam 11

 bAguga satatamu nI guNamulu balku tyAgarAja vinuta O rAma
